amendment.description: To urge the President to prioritize and expedite the provision of lethal and non-lethal military assistance to Ukraine, consistent with United States national interests and policies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 598 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 598 proposed by Senator Capito for Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S1831; text: CR S1831) To urge the President to prioritize and expedite the provision of lethal and non-lethal military assistance to Ukraine, consistent with United States national interests and policies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 598 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 598 proposed by Senator Capito for Senator Lee.
